name: SeCo
description:
SeCo is a simple tool that allows you to quickly find brands & other properties from simpleicons.org.


Features

✨ Import colours & icons from brands, like twitter, facebook, and many more!

✨ Place SVGs without the frame!

✨ Sort items alphabetically or by colour

✨ Quick Search / Auto complete!

✨ Docked Favourites at the top of your list for easy access!


How to use this plugin

Simply search for the icon you're looking for, and click on the tile representing your query. Then you will have the option to populate the icon of your query to your current view, or apply the colour to your selection(s). If you frequent this item a lot, you now have the option to save it to your favourites for next time!


--

If you encounter any bugs or usability issues, feel free to DM me on twitter @ltrademark, or leave a comment below.
